# RateLimiterOptionsExtensions class

Provides extension methods for copying rate limiter options and policies.

```csharp
public static class RateLimiterOptionsExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [CopyFrom](RateLimiterOptionsExtensions/CopyFrom)(…) | Copies all rate limiter options and policies from the source to the target RateLimiterOptions. |
